situation: Just lost my job. Don't know how to continue with my lifestyle.

rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: It sounds like you're weighing two important paths. One option could be to start small with the catering idea while also applying for jobs in other fields. To get started, you might consider these steps: 1) List the types of dishes you could cater; 2) Research local regulations for catering services; 3) Create a simple plan to test your idea with friends or family.
